message: I propose dividing the money 7000$ for me and 3000$ for you. This way, we both get a fair share, with a slight emphasis on my share due to the inflation factor.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair split considering the inflation factor.
Considering the inflation factor, I propose an equal division of the money, each receiving $5000. This ensures fairness and prevents any potential loss in value over time.
